docs.lead_paragraph: AS the Yuletide draws near again THE NEW YORK TIMES, according to its old custom, presents today the Hundred Neediest Cases among the city's unfortunate. These represent but a fraction of the families and individuals that must turn to the charity of their fellow-beings for help.

headline.main: NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES; An Appeal to Those Whose Christmas Will Be Merry to Share a Little of the Season's Gladness With the Most Destitute Among the Great City's Unfortunates Cases Selected for THE NEW YORK TIMES by Four of the City's Leading Charity Associations NEW YORK'S ONE HUNDRED NEEDIEST CASES
